alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 12 at 4:15PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following area, Northern Inner Channels. This includes the cities of Skagway, Klukwan, And Haines. * WHEN...Through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Soils remain moist and excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, other low-lying areas and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain will move into the region through Thursday evening and persist into the overnight hours before tapering off Friday morning. So far about one half inch of rain has fallen with additional 1 to 2 inches with locally higher amounts along higher terrain. The latest satellite rain rate estimates show 0.15 to .30 inches per hour over the eastern Gulf of Alaska that will move over the area through the evening hours.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
